data.text: @DrBrainMD @d31672575 @JReinerMD So, what is the correct way to use the numbers?
@d31672575 @JReinerMD What are the real numbers, Will? And your sources?
@JReinerMD Reported your tweet for misleading on health.
@AlastairMcA30 @andrew_rudick @JReinerMD Why are you still comparing Covid w/flu over a time period when flu went away?

@JReinerMD Why do you DELIBERATELY spread Covid misinformation?

Do you HATE CHILDREN that much?
@AlastairMcA30 @andrew_rudick @JReinerMD You might as well say COVID has killed more kids than smallpox or the Black Death over the last two years. Equally meaningless.
@AlastairMcA30 @andrew_rudick @JReinerMD That's because the flu has virtually disappeared. Disappointing how innumerate some medics are.
@VijayHegde20 @JReinerMD But those NPIs don't work against Covid.
